          <title>
            <string language="en">Structure of solid hydrogen fluoride</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Struktur des festen Wasserstofffluorids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structure de fluorure plein d'hydrogène</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrutura do fluoreto contínuo do hidrogênio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Struttura del fluoruro solido dell'idrogeno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δομή του στερεού φθοριδίου υδρογόνου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura del fluoruro sólido del hidrógeno</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a structural representation of solid hydrogen fluoride. The molecules have a zig-zag shape and are held together by hydrogen bonds.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen fluoride</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">states of matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">structural representation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine strukturelle 
Darstellung des festen Wasserstofffluorids. Die Moleküle haben 
eine Zickzackform und werden durch Wasserstoffbindungen 
zusammengehalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une représentation 
structurale de fluorure plein d'hydrogène. Les molécules ont 
une forme de zig-zag et sont liées par des obligations 
d'hydrogène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma respresentação 
estrutural do fluoreto contínuo do hidrogênio. As moléculas 
têm uma forma do zig-zag e são prendidas junto por ligações do 
hidrogênio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una rappresentazione 
strutturale del fluoruro solido dell'idrogeno. Le molecole hanno
una figura di zigzag e sono tenute insieme dai legami dell'idrogeno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δομική αντιπροσώπευση του
στερεού φθοριδίου υδρογόνου. Τα μόρια έχουν μια μορφή 
τρεκλίσματος και διατηρούνται τη συνοχή από τους δεσμούς 
υδρογόνου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una representación 
estructural del fluoruro sólido del hidrógeno. Las moléculas 
tienen una dimensión de una variable del zigzag y son ligadas por los
enlaces del hidrógeno.</string>
          </description>
